name: Destination Station
description:
Welcome to the Stonehenge Galactic Transport Hub team!

None of your predecessors lasted more than a day, but we are sure you will do a great job!

Just keep the passengers happy by sending them on their way without delay.

It’s a pretty simple job really. We are sure you will do great.

Controls
  • Left click to interact
  • Scroll wheel to zoom in and out
  • WASD to move camera about
  • ESC to access in-game options menu
